misuses.description: The use of SecureRandom with a predictable seed is vulnerable to a chosen-ciphertext attack.
misuses.recommendation: Use a secure and unpredictable seed, such as a random number generated by a cryptographically secure pseudo-random number generator (CSPRNG).

fixes.description: By using a cryptographically secure random number generator (CSPRNG) to generate the seed, the risk of a chosen-ciphertext attack is greatly reduced.
